title: WWII Marine Raiders Finally Come Home

content: To me there is no greater honor than to die for your country in uniform. These Marines did that. They are the true heros of this country. I hope everyone remembers that the next time they call a person a hero for saving a cat up a tree.
reply: To me there is no greater honor than to die for your country in uniform. These Marines did that. They are the true heros of this country. I hope everyone remembers that the next time they call a person a hero for saving a cat up a tree.
title: WWII Marine Raiders Finally Come Home

content: Thanks to the people of Makon Atoll we got back 19 marines: Cpl Mason O. Yarbrough FM 1 Vernon L. Castle Cpl I B Earles PFC William A Gallagher CPL Daniel A Gaston PFC AShly W Hicks Capt. Gerald P Holtom Cpl Harris J Johnson Cpl Kenneth K. Kunkle Pvt Carlyle Oscar Larson Cpl Edward Maciejewski Pvt Robert B Maulding Pfc Kenneth M Montgomery Pfc Norman W Mortensen Pvf Franklin M Nodland Cpl Robert Brooks Pearson Pfc Charles A Selby Pvt John Eugene Vandenberg Sgt Clyde Thomason MarineRetiredWife: Thank you for posting this
